item.title: Version 1
item.description: wick-config::v1 WickConfig Configuration for Wick applications and components. Any of the following types: AppConfiguration ComponentConfiguration TypesConfiguration TestConfiguration LocationReference A reference to a location on disk, URL, or registry. Alias for: string LiquidJsonValue A liquid JSON template. Alias for: string Glob A glob pattern, ex: **/.html* Alias for: string AppConfiguration The Application configuration defines a standalone Wick application. Field name Type Description Required? Shortform? metadata Metadata Associated metadata for this component. name string The application’s name.
